name: Dream Quest
description: Play cards! Kill monsters! Level Up! Dream Quest is a roguelike deckbuilding game inspired by the likes of Ascension, Magic: the Gathering, and Shandalar. Explore randomly generated levels as one of 13 classes in short, 30 minute, sessions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 1.3 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 1.3 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
